title: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeCableTraySegment
description:
An (typically) open carrier segment onto which cables are laid. 
HISTORY: IFC4 - NominalLength deleted. To be handled as a quantity measure

NominalWidth.title: NominalWidth
NominalWidth.description: The nominal width of the segment.

NominalHeight.title: NominalHeight
NominalHeight.description: The nominal height of the segment.

HasCover.title: HasCover
HasCover.description: Indication of whether the cable tray has a cover (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE). By default, this value should be set to FALSE..
